message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'll sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Can you consider that?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth more than $85. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $87.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $82.50 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to save more, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $84. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Can you consider that?
